PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeFittingTypeJunction
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe fitting type attributes for junction shapes.

PropertyDef.Name: JunctionLeftAngle
PropertyDef.Definition: The change of direction of flow for the left junction.

PropertyDef.Name: JunctionLeftRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: The radius of bending for the left junction.

PropertyDef.Name: JunctionRightAngle
PropertyDef.Definition: The change of direction of flow for the right junction where 0 indicates straight segment.

PropertyDef.Name: JunctionRightRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: The radius of bending for the right junction where 0 indicates sharp bend.

PropertyDef.Name: JunctionType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of junction. TEE=3 ports, CROSS = 4 ports.
